metatags.og:title: Illinois Passes Law That Allows Residents To Carry Mobile IDs - Spiceworks
metatags.og:description: Illinois has passed a law allowing residents to show mobile driver's licenses and state IDs instead of physical ones. Learn more.

metatags.twitter:creator: @nbcchicago
metatags.og:description: Beginning Jan. 1, a new state law known as HB 4592 allowed the Secretary of State's office to issue mobile ID cards and driver's licenses. But how can you get one?
